constructor.notice: Network: Sepolia Aggregator: ETH/USD Address: 0x694AA1769357215DE4FAC081bf1f309aDC325306 Aggregator: ETH-USD 24hr Realized Volatility Address: 0x31D04174D0e1643963b38d87f26b0675Bb7dC96e Aggregator: BTC/ETH Address: 0x5fb1616F78dA7aFC9FF79e0371741a747D2a7F22

getAttackParameters().notice: Returns the base attack power, adjusted volatility, and overall attack parameter.

getBaseAttackPower().notice: Returns the base attack power from ETH price (1/100 of ETH price).

getLatestEthVolatility().notice: Returns the latest 24hr Realized Volatility for ETH/USD.

getOverallAttackParameter().notice: Returns the overall attack parameter (between 50 and 120).
